contextual_notes: The user expressed urgency and stress initially, which may have influenced early satisfaction scores.
The user showed increasing satisfaction as they received effective assistance and reassurance.
general_insights: Timely and clear assistance is crucial in urgent scenarios to improve user satisfaction.
Providing reassurance and confirming understanding can significantly enhance user confidence and satisfaction.
Maintaining a supportive and empathetic tone helps build user trust and satisfaction over time.
